means: 使成为气体，使气化( gasify的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Both forms are readily gasified by electrical discharge without leaving any tangible residue.
sentence.Network_cn: 两种形态都易被放电气化而不剩任何可触察的残余.

sentence.Network_en: The lignite pressurized gasified furnace has a severe impact on the environment.
sentence.Network_cn: 褐煤加压气化炉对环境有重大影响.

sentence.Network_en: Also can be used to dilute beer to produce gasified alcohol drink.
sentence.Network_cn: 亦可用其进行啤酒的稀释和气酒的生产.
